question: Which of the following activities is the best example of instinctive behavior in an animal?
candidate_answers: (A) A dog sits when told to sit by its owner. (B) A bird avoids an insect that has a bad taste. (C) A newly hatched sea turtle walks toward the ocean. (D) A chimpanzee uses a stick to pull termites from a tree stump.
answer: A dog sits when told to sit by its owner.
label: A
